content.prompt: During the decade of the 1960â€™s, young people, Black people, American Indians, Hispanic Americans, and women were among the groups protesting various aspects of American society. All of the following were protested against by one or more of these following groups EXCEPT the

choices.label: excessive cost of the social security system
United States involvement in the Vietnam War
exclusion of women from the mainstream of American life
increasing bureaucratization and impersonality of American institutions

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
